bibl.title: More Hadrianic Documents from the Judaean Desert, and the Bar Kokhba Revolt.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Hannah M. COTTON and Ada YARDENI (edited by), Aramaic, Hebrew and Greek Documentary Texts from Nahal Hever and Other Sites, with an Appendix Containing Alleged Qumran Texts (The Seiyâl Collection II) (Oxford, 1997).
